fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

nodes.name: Segments have the most customers predicted to churn.
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
-- This query identifies which segments have the most customers predicted to churn.
SELECT
    SECTOR,
    CATEGORY,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CUSTOMER_ID) AS At_Risk_Customer_Count_in_Segment
FROM
    fire_temp_table  
WHERE
    prediction = 1 -- Filter for only the customers the model predicts will churn
GROUP BY
    SECTOR,
    CATEGORY
ORDER BY
    3 DESC, 1 ASC,2 ASC
LIMIT 3
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: Total Customers Predicted to Churn
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
-- This query calculates the total number of unique customers predicted to churn.
SELECT
    COUNT(DISTINCT CUSTOMER_ID) AS Total_Customers_Predicted_to_Churn
FROM
    fire_temp_table 
WHERE
    prediction = 1
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Top At-Risk Sector
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
-- This query identifies the single sector with the most at-risk customers.
SELECT
    SECTOR
FROM
    fire_temp_table
WHERE
    prediction = 1
GROUP BY
    SECTOR
ORDER BY
    COUNT(DISTINCT CUSTOMER_ID) DESC -- Order by the count of customers in descending order
LIMIT 1
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Output Column Names
fields.description: Name of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Output Column Types
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns

fields.name: outputColFormats
fields.title: Output Column Formats
fields.description: Format of the Output Columns

nodes.name: Top At-Risk Category
nodes.description: This node runs the given SQL on the incoming DataFrame
nodes.hint: Whenever the table is changed, go to InferSchema tab and Infer the Schema

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
-- This query identifies the single category with the most at-risk customers.
SELECT
    CATEGORY
FROM
    fire_temp_table
WHERE
    prediction = 1
GROUP BY
    CATEGORY
ORDER BY
    COUNT(DISTINCT CUSTOMER_ID) DESC -- Order by the count of customers in descending order
LIMIT 1
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run
